availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Sanders Kimberly (Foster, Bracken Co., mechanic)

body.p: Foster, Kentucky, mechanic. Ohio native. Son of Luman Kimberly and Mary Ann Calvert Kimberly. Married Nancy McCoy Kimberly in 1861. Father of Edwin Bruce Kimberly, Albert Kimberly, and Lena Kimberly. Resident of Union Township, Ohio, in 1860. Mechanic in Foster in 1863.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Brown County, Union Township, Ripley post office, 21; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, Foster, p. 14; Twelfth Manuscript Census of the United States (1900), Population Schedules, Texas, Caldwell County, Justice Precinct No. 2, p. 15; Find A Grave, "Rev George Sanders Kimberly (1836 - 1926)," Memorial #50137021, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=50137021 (accessed July 20, 2017); KYR-0001-004-0012.
